titleStmt.title: An answer to some queries propos'd by W.C., or, A refutation of Helmont's pernicious error (that every man is often born, and hath twelve ages of tryal allow'd him in the world by God) warmly contended for, in and about Lambourn in Wiltshire : in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Hall, John, 1627-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leon. Lichfield for John Buckeridge ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Hall.
Signed at end J.H. [i.e. John Hall]
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
